open_risks: Inflation re-acceleration/tails reprice via PPI/Core PPI: could push real yields higher, pressure NQ duration and force gold/weak-USD narratives to unwind
Megacap earnings concentration/breadth shock: a small number of large names can gap ES/NQ regardless of macro; dispersion increases hedging demand and intraday reversals
USD-policy headline risk: rhetoric interpreted as endorsing a weaker dollar can accelerate gold/commodity moves and destabilize cross-asset correlations
Geopolitical headline reversal (Iran): dialogue signals can fade quickly; any escalation can reinsert oil/safe-haven bid and tighten financial conditions abruptly
Market-on-close imbalance / liquidity air pockets: late-day flow can dominate tape and exaggerate headline reactions, especially after large earnings moves
